rows.text_1: Let’s look at how @data.characters.f1_mother.name manages to take care of herself when life gets a bit too much.

rows.text_2:
@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name: “@data.characters.f1_mother.name, come and play with me with my dolls!” 

 @data.characters.f1_mother.name  *(thinking)*: “I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww… Maybe I can finish cooking and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.”

@data.characters.f1_mother.name: “Allright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, let me finish dinner quickly, and then I will come play with you.” 

 @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name: “Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.name.”
@data.characters.f1_mother.name  *(thinking)*: “I am glad I took some time with my child. I feel a bit better and my mind feels clearer already. After dinner, I deserve a cup of tea by myself.”

@data.characters.f1_mother.name  *(thinking)*: “What a day. I have a lot on my plate, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit with my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!"
